pr_title: #4005 For images in set  removed if user selected one image

timeline.message: #4005 For images in set  removed if user selected one image

timeline.bodyText: "Item" has a different meaning in our app. Please rename to isMultipleFilesSelected thanks!
timeline.author: nicolas-raoul
nicolas-raoul

replies.bodyText: D'oh! sorry I was debugging something.
replies.author: gouri-panda

timeline.message: Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/commons-app/apps-android-commons into pull/4022 and resolved conflicts

timeline.bodyText:
Ah, I forgot! We need javadoc for each new method/member.
After that I will merge.
timeline.author: nicolas-raoul

replies.bodyText: @nicolas-raoul Should we add Javadoc here or in getter fields?
replies.author: gouri-panda

replies.bodyText: Both methods and members, actually. Sorry for the hassle, but documentation is usually written once, read many times, so it is a good investment :-)
replies.author: nicolas-raoul

replies.bodyText:
Javadoc must use this format for members too:
/**
 * Example javadoc
 */

Thanks!
replies.author: nicolas-raoul

timeline.author: nicolas-raoul

timeline.bodyText: javadoc, and also one empty line before the method, to make it easier to see.
timeline.author: nicolas-raoul
nicolas-raoul
nicolas-raoul

timeline.bodyText:
Thanks @gouri-panda , since the purpose of the last review was adding javadocs could you please be more specific with javadocs instead of just writing the name of the method. Ie. this one could be something like:
"If multiple file is not selected, makes the visibility of subtitle text view gone."
timeline.author: neslihanturan

replies.bodyText: Thanks, @neslihanturan .From now on I'll keep this in my mind.
replies.author: gouri-panda

timeline.bodyText: Same here, could be more definitive. "Sets the Depict subtitle" is not actually what the method does. It decides the visibility of depics text view if multiplefile is not selecred as far as I can understand.
timeline.author: neslihanturan

timeline.bodyText:
Needs one more star here and another on the next line :-)
Must look like this:
/**
 * Example javadoc
 */

Thanks!
timeline.author: nicolas-raoul
